job.title: Video Machine Learning Algorithm Engineer
job.description:
Summary
Imagine what you could do here! At Apple, new insights have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Do you bring passion and dedication to your job? If so, we are looking for individuals like you.


We are looking for talent who will join us to craft the future of video. Our team develops cutting edge technology and system that enable intelligent and interactive video experience in Apple’s media products, such as Photos, Camera, FaceTime, AirPlay, SideCar, TV+, etc. You will work closely with a group of highly motivated specialists to develop exciting machine learning technologies that will make a huge impact in the products.


Key Qualifications
Strong experience in video and machine learning algorithm development

Deep understanding in neural network, strong experience in designing and optimizing networks

Strong programming, debugging and problem solving skills

Creative and detail-oriented

Strong communication skills

You are upbeat, adaptable, and results oriented with a positive attitude


Description
As a video machine learning algorithm engineer in our team, you will be responsible for developing machine learning technologies, implementing and optimizing the solution, and shipping it in the products. You will be responsible for developing new algorithms, improving existing ones, designing neural network architectures, training, implementing, integrating and optimizing networks, etc.


Education & Experience
MS Computer Science or MS Electrical Engineering or equivalent


Additional Requirements
Nice to have but not required:

Experience developing real-time and low latency video system solutions

Experience in training data acquisition and management


Role Number: 200269294
